website_summaries.verdict: This coin case is small and cute and seems like a great deal, but it may be too small if you have a lot to carry.
pros: This case is durable, features dual pockets, is a perfect size for cards
Makes a nice gift that will stay in style for years
cons: It may be too small for some, as it doesn't hold much else other than coins and cards

customer_reviews.title: The description is not well written this is a tiny ...
customer_reviews.text: The description is not well written this is a tiny coin purse not a wallet. If you order it is half the size of a iphone 4. It will hold coins and that is it.
customer_reviews.author: Aron

customer_reviews.title: Maybe nice as a change purse
customer_reviews.text: Looked bigger in the picture, cannot even put a credit card in it. Maybe nice as a change purse.
customer_reviews.author: Little Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like it so far... Haven't used it much. Don't carry my coach stuff during work week..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Beautifully package for a gift
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Beautifully package for a gift. my cousin did told me she is having a little bit of a problem with the zipper in a few occasions.
customer_reviews.author: starfishgurl1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size change purse.
customer_reviews.text: Great small wallet to carry with you. Perfect size to put your debit cards etc in. Only complaint is that zipper ends are a bit too tight for the attachment and tend to stick but otherwise it's a great piece.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I l8ke the size and the dual pockets. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I l8ke the size and the dual pockets. It feels a little flimsy for the price. Delivery was on schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: More like a coin purse. Just enough room for driving license and change
customer_reviews.author: LaTerra Weathersby

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black/tan one but received a white one. :(
customer_reviews.author: Diane Binda

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: again it was very small. thought it would be twice or three times smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't feel like it will last
customer_reviews.text: Zippers get stuck... I don't feel like it will last. This was a Christmas present for my wife. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed. On line sizes are not true to wallets ...
customer_reviews.text: It was much smaller than I thought it would be. Not enough room for credit cards and no holder for identification card. I was disappointed. On line sizes are not true to wallets in the store.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie miller

product_meta.title: Coach Signature Double Zip Coin Case Brown/Black F63975
product_meta.description: Mini coin purse hold for cards, coins, fold bill, and receipts.
feature_bullets: Hold cards, coins, fold bill, and receipts.
